name: Shards of Me
description:
# About

Every day we deal with problems that occur during the day. Sometimes those problems pile up and we wait to deal with them. In some realities those problems can manifest into something physical, and entrap us within ourselves.   

Find the crystalized negativity and destroy them so that you can escape!   

Along the way you will find shards of yourself, maybe they can help? 

# Controls  

A or Left Arrow - move left  

D or Right Arrow - move right  

Space or Up Arrow - Jump  

E - Interact / Pickup / Drop  

Z - Word Attack (if unlocked)  

X - Hug Attack (if unlocked)  

Left Shift - Dash (if unlocked)  

Code & Graphics - Craftgineer

Audio - @da___nae

Song can also be found on SoundCloud  

https://soundcloud.com/purplelum/shards-of-me

v1.1 - fixed collider for door

v1.2 - audio fixes
